You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rbarr;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&RBarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2910/index.htm U+02910].
  * `&rBarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/290f/index.htm U+0290F].
  * `&rbarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/290d/index.htm U+0290D].
